comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: This caption, " Washing clothes in helmet with very little water", appears to be incorrect. The women pictured is holding a rectangular shaped washboard upon her thighs. It has a wooden frame with a galvanized iron corrugated centerpiece or corrugated glass centerpiece against which the dirty clothes are rubbed to wash them. I have a washboard almost identical to the one in the photograph. With three buckets available, it is hard to see how a helmet would have been used. See some washboard references here: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Washboard images.google.com.au/images?hl=en&q=washboard&um=...
